title: NO SEC DEPOSIT! Apartments in a Building next to Park 718-373-7700
posting_body: ['NO SECURITY DEPOSIT OPTION!', 'Renovated apartments in a buildings (some WITH DOORMAN & SWIMMING POOLS) close to the Park and water in Bensonhurst by Atlantic Management Co (718) 373-7700.', 'YOU MAY CONTACT US BY SENDING A TEXT MESSAGE TO 646-642-3854 or 917-804-4495.', 'We are open for business until 7 pm!', 'OPEN HOUSE Wednesday 2 - 6 pm & Sunday 12 - 3 pm OR by appointment', '2056 Cropsey Avenue, Apartment 1A, Brooklyn, NY 11214', '2 BR / 2 BTH apartment w/full separate kitchen & dining area in doorman building w/swimming pool - rent $2,995 & up', 'Large living room w/dining area & separate kitchen.', 'MANY WITH NEW APPLIANCES, INCLUDING DISHWASHERS, MICROWAVES AND AC.', 'Hardwood floors; NEWLY RENOVATED tiled & windowed kitchen & bathroom.', 'Some apartments are with BALCONIES.', 'VERY good light.', 'WHAT YOU SEE IS WHAT YOU GET!', 'Pictures of actual available apartments for rent!', 'WELL MAINTAINED ELEVATOR BUILDINGS w/LIVE-IN-SUPER & LAUNDRY ROOM ON PREMISES.', 'Some buildings are with DOORMAN, SWIMMING POOL, BALCONIES & GARAGE.', 'WATERFRONT PROPERTY NEXT TO THE PARK.', 'CLOSE TO SHOPPING CENTER.', 'EXPRESS BUSS X28/X38 TO MANHATTAN & DOWNTOWN BROOKLYN.', 'WALKING DISTANCE TO D & M SUBWAY.', '15 MINUETS DRIVING TO MANHATTAN.', 'OPEN HOUSE Wednesday 2 - 6 pm & Sunday 12 - 3 pm OR by appointment', '2056 Cropsey Avenue, Apartment 1A, Brooklyn, NY 11214', 'Atlantic Management Co (718) 373-7700.', 'YOU MAY CONTACT US BY SENDING A TEXT MESSAGE TO 646-642-3854.', 'We are open for business until 7 pm!', 'Brooklyn, NY 11214', 'Equal Housing Opportunity - Atlantic Management Co']
